Content: The Forward Maintenance Area - Mullaittivu (FMA-MLT) celebrated its 10th anniversary recently with Major General C.K Handunmulla, Commander, FMA-MLT as the Chief Guest. On 10 August troops offered lunch to the Ladani Childrenâ€™s Orphanage and awarded gifts to them. On 11 August all FMA troops attended a Bodhi Pooja at Muladeepa temple, Mullaittivu. Subsequently, on the anniversary day, the Commander, FMA joined the troops for all rank tea. A troop address and a tree-planting event followed.
